summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a yellow car is moving steadily in the same lane. As the frames progress, a black SUV from the left lane starts to merge into the self-vehicles lane, potentially causing a cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while observing the yellow car ahead. As the black SUV begins to merge from the left lane, the self-driving vehicle may need to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A yellow car, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Left: A black SUV, approximately 15 meters away, merging into the self-vehicles lane, potentially causing a cut-in situation.
